title: Draft Collection
description: A curated collection of apps, developer tools, and documentation for users and developers.

apps.title: BULLY
apps.description: A revolutionary music production app designed by Kanye West. Features include beat making, sample manipulation, and AI-assisted composition.

apps.title: Photoshop
apps.description: Industry-standard image editing software for photo manipulation, graphic design, and digital art.

apps.title: ChatGPT CLI
apps.description: A command-line interface for ChatGPT to integrate AI into your terminal workflows.

apps.title: TensorFlow
apps.description: An open-source machine learning framework for AI model training and deployment.

apps.title: VS Code
apps.description: Lightweight but powerful code editor for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

apps.title: Node.js
apps.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

apps.title: Linux Kernel
apps.description: The core of the Linux operating system, used in servers, mobile devices, and embedded systems.

apps.title: React Native
apps.description: A framework for building native apps using React.

apps.title: Docker
apps.description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications inside containers.

apps.title: Rust Programming Language
apps.description: A fast, reliable, and memory-safe systems programming language.

apps.title: Getting Started with Draft Collection
apps.description:
# Welcome to Draft Collection

This collection features handpicked apps, tools, and resources for developers and users.

## How to Use
- Browse the list of apps and tools.
- Click on an item to view its details.
- Documentation is available for some entries.

apps.title: Privacy Policy
apps.description:
# Privacy Policy

We value your privacy. This document outlines how we handle your data in Draft Collection.

## Data Collection
- We do not collect personal data.
- Open-source repositories are displayed from public sources.
